entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rain at times mixed with snow early this evening. Snow level rising to 1800 metres after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 6:12 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 6:12 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
